page.title: 08RECREATION IN CUMBERNAULD
page.content: There are lots of things to do in Cumbernauld to use up your free time. There are many clubs and sports that children, teenagers and adults can take part in. In Abronhill you'll find clubs, churches, shops, a leisure centre and a library. If you want to go out for the day with the family then you could go to Palacerigg Country Park which is just south if Abronhill. There are many different kinds of animals like wolves, highland cattle and deer which are kept there. There is also a golf club with a club- house for members. For BMX fans there are a few runs near to the village of Cumbernauld which also has a fair in the summer and sometimes a circus. The Tryst Sports Centre which is in the Town Centre has 2 swimming pools, judo, karate, saunas, squash courts and trampolining.
